metadata.title: CVE-2023-28330 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient sanitizing in backup resulted in an arbitrary file read risk.The capability to access this feature is only available to teachers,managers and admins by default.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
